input.service_name: Callable: New Hire Onboarding - Add manager to #remoteonboarding slack channel

block.name: declare_variable
block.title: Create variable PROCESS_COL_add_mgr_to_#remoteonboarding_slack

data.process_col_add_mgr_to_remoteonboarding_:
=#Only start to process this automation Thursday (or 5 days) before start date
if (_('data.workato_service.42ccd3d9.request.Employee_Start_Date')-5.days) < today
#Only flow if starting in office column = 'Remote Start'
  if _('data.workato_service.42ccd3d9.request.In_Office_Or_Remote') == "Remote Start"
#Only flow if the associated field actually contains a checkbox
    if _('data.workato_service.42ccd3d9.request.GSheet_Col').present?
#Only flow if the associated field checkbox is set to 'FALSE'
      if _('data.workato_service.42ccd3d9.request.GSheet_Col') == "FALSE"
        true
      else
        false
      end
    else
      false
    end
  else
    false
  end
else
  false
end
